title: The answer is always 'Democracy', even though 10th class students will no longer learn about it.
selftext:
- The question asked to the PM on minority rights in India.

The other question asked by an Indian journalist was about climate crisis lol... ğŸ‘ğŸ‘
comments: Question was out of syllabus clearly. They should instead have asked how PM Modi likes his mangos. Silly people asking pointed questions that can corner him.
